name: PolygonRain
description:
Polygon Rain is an arcade game, remembering the good old classics.

Objective of the game

* Score as many points as you can.

Instructions

Controls

W/S : Change menu options

A/D : Player Movement

J : Shoot / Select Menu option

Esc : Pause game (only during gameplay)

HUD

* Heart (black square) Remaining hits before you are defeated

* Bullets (black square) Basic bullets, once they hit something you recover them.

* Bullets (grey square) Extra bullets, once shot you no longer recover them.

Enemies

There are 4 types of enemies, each with a different number of edges. Starting with 6 edges (hexagon) and going down to 3 (triangle).

The more edges the enemy has, the slower it moves.

Once you hit an enemy, two new smaller ones will spawn. Hitting a triangle will not spawn new enemies and has a chance of dropping an item.

Items

* Heart: Recover a health point (if you are not full health).

* Bullet: Gain 1 extra bullet (if you have less than 6).
